position: JioSaavn | Indian Institute Of Technology, Kharagpur

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: • Conducted statistical analysis on Drinking water, health and sanitation data of 65th, 69th and 76th round provided from NSSOusing R•Postprocessed the data reports to extract inter-state tables of the parameters of 35 states and union territories of India using Python• Implemented Excel and SQL for raw data collection and formatted data from reports according to standard convention for data processing• Managed over 2 lakhs household data, provided statistical report with more than 95% accuracy which is uploaded in India Data Portal
experience.description_html: • Conducted statistical analysis on Drinking water, health and sanitation data of 65th, 69th and 76th round provided from NSSOusing R•Postprocessed the data reports to extract inter-state tables of the parameters of 35 states and union territories of India using Python• Implemented Excel and SQL for raw data collection and formatted data from reports according to standard convention for data processing• Managed over 2 lakhs household data, provided statistical report with more than 95% accuracy which is uploaded in India Data Portal

experience.title: Captain
experience.description: •Led a team of 23 athletes to participate across 19 events at practice sessions, managed team and time effectively by attending classes•Effectively communicated with a diverse group of athletes, sports officials and coach and developed strategies to meet performance goals

experience.company: Radhakrishnan Hall of Residence Athletics Team for Inter Hall Athletics Meet

experience.title: Secretary Athletics
experience.description: •	Elected by an electorate of 607 students to lead its effort to compete in the Athletics Inter Hall General Championships•	Planned and Executed a budget of INR 42,000 for  improvement of Athletics Facilities in hall for General Championship•	Managed more than 72 practice sessions for athletics team consisting of 50 members and catering of their daily needs •	Secured Silver in Inter Hall Athletics General Championship after 28 years for the RadhaKrishnan Hall of Residence
